ADDRESS_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION: Enter your project's installation ZIP code. Then, select your store for product availability.
ADDRESS_INFORMATION.NO_STORE: There are no stores for this area
ADDRESS_INFORMATION.DESCRIPTION_CONFIRMATION_MESSAGE:
Some of your selected choices might not be available if the ZIP Code is changed.
 Would you like to continue?

MATERIAL.TITLE: MATERIAL
MATERIAL.DESCRIPTION: Select the material for your countertop
MATERIAL.ENTER_ZIP_CODE: Please enter your ZIP Code to be able to select your preferred Material.
MATERIAL.UNAVAILABLE_MATERIAL_COLOR_SELECTION_SEL: Your selected Material and Color are not available in your area yet.
MATERIAL.UNAVAILABLE_MATERIAL_SELECTION_SELECTION: Your selected Material is not available in your area yet.
MATERIAL.SEND_EMAIL: Send us an email to find out when it will become available.

COLOR.TITLE: COLOR
COLOR.DESCRIPTION: Choose the color for your countertop. If you are not sure, you can always purchase a sample.
COLOR.SELECT_MATERIAL: Please select your Material type in order to choose your preferred color.
COLOR.UNAVAILABLE_SELECTION: Your selected Color is not available in your area yet.
COLOR.SEND_EMAIL: Send us an email to find out when it will become available.
COLOR.THICKNESS_INFO: Would you like to change the surface thickness of your countertop from 3 CM to 2 CM? Please be aware that the price of colors will change.

COUNTERTOP.TITLE: DESIGN COUNTERTOP
COUNTERTOP.PREDEFINED_SHAPE_DESCRIPTION: Start drawing a shape by, selecting a predefined shape
COUNTERTOP.FREE_DRAW_DESCRIPTION: or drawing the layout of your countertop
COUNTERTOP.DISABLED_CARD_DESCRIPTION: Please introduce your ZIP Code and start the search by pressing on the magnifying glass to be able to design your countertop.
COUNTERTOP.MODAL_DESCRIPTION: The diagram below represents side options for your countertop.

EDGE.TITLE: EDGE
EDGE.DESCRIPTION: Select the Edge type for your Countertop
EDGE.SELECT_MATERIAL: Please select your Material type in order to choose your preferred edge.

CORNER_RADIUS.TITLE: CORNER RADIUS
CORNER_RADIUS.DESCRIPTION: Select the Corner Radius type for your countertop and then click on the corners of shapes from drawing area to apply it.
CORNER_RADIUS.SELECT_MATERIAL: Please select your Material type in order to choose your preferred corner radius.

CUSTOM_SIDE.TITLE: CUSTOM SIDE
CUSTOM_SIDE.DESCRIPTION: Select the Side type for your countertop and then click on the edges of shapes from drawing area to apply it.

DIAGONAL_CORNER.TITLE: DIAGONAL CORNER
DIAGONAL_CORNER.DESCRIPTION: Select the Diagonal Corner type for your countertop and then click on the corners of shapes from drawing area to apply it.

TEAR_OUT_COUNTERTOP.TITLE: TEAR-OUT COUNTERTOPS
TEAR_OUT_COUNTERTOP.DESCRIPTION: Select one or more of the below options if you want professionals to remove your existing countertop and haul it away.

PRICING_AREA.DEFAULT_DESCRIPTION: Start estimate by designing your countertop using your preferred material and color
PRICING_AREA.BASIC_INSTALLATION_CONTENT: Basic installation includes template services, fabrication, delivery and installation of your countertop.

VALIDATION_MESSAGE.ZIP_CODE_LESS_5DIGITS: ZIP Code can't be less than 5 digits
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.ZIP_CODE_MORE_5DIGITS: ZIP Code can't be more than 5 digits
VALIDATION_MESSAGE.ZIP_CODE_NUMERIC_INPUT: ZIP Code must have numeric input

ERROR_MESSAGE.STH_WENT_WRONG: Something went wrong! Please try again later!
